plot: A college student (Ben) finds a snarky homeless man (Jack) living in his apartment building's storage locker. Out of pity, Ben lets Jack stay with him until he gets his priorities in order. Shenanigans ensue... of course.
plot_en: A college student (Ben) finds a snarky homeless man (Jack) living in his apartment building's storage locker. Out of pity, Ben lets Jack stay with him until he gets his priorities in order. Shenanigans ensue... of course.

title: Live at 205
